description: Most species require at least basic shelter from the constant rainfall and gusting winds.
Bats prefer to live in spacious and dark homes. Bat Houses are required to fulfill this need.
Beavers prefer to live in cozy, wooden homes. Beaver Houses are required to fulfill this need.
Foxes prefer to live in wooden, well camouflaged houses. Fox Houses are required to fulfill this need.
Frogs are at home in water. Frog Houses are required to fulfill this need.
Harpies prefer to live in well-lit, spacious homes. Harpy Houses are required to fulfill this need.
Humans prefer to live in solid, safe homes. Human Houses are required to fulfill this need.
Lizards prefer to live in warm, dry homes. Lizard Houses are required to fulfill this need.
This need is fulfilled at the Hearth. It requires <sprite name="[food processed] jerky"> jerky. Satisfying this need increases the chance of producing double yields.
This need is fulfilled at the Hearth. It requires <sprite name="[food processed] porridge"> porridge. Satisfying this need increases the chance of producing double yields.

This need is fulfilled at the Hearth. It requires <sprite name="[needs] coats"> coats. Satisfying this need grants a Resolve bonus during the storm.
